comments: Travers Breen is a great man. I took his Weight Training class and it was so easy. All you have to do is show up and life weights. There are about two take home projects that are very easy. The final test is very easy also.

comments: Great guy who makes forced gym classes enjoyable. Only thing is don\'t be late, at least for cycling where we leave campus. You must be on time or we leave without you. Cares about his students and his class was enjoyable. I highly recommend.

comments: As long as you know how to listen and take notes like an adult, this class is for you. Easy, laid back, and she knows her material well.

tag_professor: Participation matters (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Caring (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: he was a really cool guy. i took both of my gyms with him which was backpacking and hiking. hiking was cool but a hard workout we hiked about 5 miles each hike, beautiful hidden gems of nature. backpacking was fun it was basically all lecture, 1 day hike and a weekend campout. it was really cold but i got close with the peoples in the class

tag_professor: Participation matters (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Caring (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Took him for backpacking my first semester and then hiking my second semester. Both classes were very enjoyable and I would DEFINITELY recommend both. The walks were bearable and fun. We built ourselves up for a 6 mile hike which was good. Class was 9-12. We would meet 930 and leave immediately and be done very early. A paragraph on each park req

tag_professor: Participation matters (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Caring (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Breen\'s a good professor. No complaints. He has students hand in one page papers on each hike and then one more paper about your favorite hike at the end, but other than that, show up (make sure to have a doctor\'s note if you miss a class), and you pass. He picks some very nice hikes and exposed us to parks we never knew about.

tag_professor: Participation matters (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Caring (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: He was an awesome teacher I took him for beginning tennis and he was really able to teach you all of the basics. He would always look around to see if anyone needed help or if their form needed to be corrected. Overall really great teacher would totally recommend you only have one test over the rules at the very end.

tag_professor: Participation matters (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Caring (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Took him for a hiking class. Class was from 9:30-11, we\'d leave immediately at 9:30 for the hikes and be done way before 11, but he wouldn\'t wait for anyone who was even a little late so my two friends failed. Then on the last day he was half an hour late to the hike and we didn\'t get out till 12. He barely spoke to the class on the hikes.

tag_professor: Participation matters (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Caring (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Wanted to take a fun class so I took hiking. And it actually ended up being really fun. We went to a lot of Long Island parks, including Fire Island. We didn\'t really "learn" much, but it was extremely involved. We never hiked less than 2 miles and went up to 6 miles the last class. Some were more difficult, so be prepared.

tag_professor: Participation matters (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Caring (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Took Fitness Walking as a summer course expecting to put no effort into the class. I was surprised and this class actually turned out to be great. Professor Breen makes it fun and it goes by really fast. The only written work was a class "journal" that recorded what we had done for the day. I would recommend taking it.

comments: Easy class. had him for volleyball, we warmed up by practicing serves and bumps. I suck at volleyball but everyone in the class was patience at least.

tag_professor: Participation matters (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Caring (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Awesome guy. I took him for both rockclimbing and hiking. He\'s really laid back and easy to work with. I don\'t know why people are saying it was so hard to get an A, I got an A in both classes and am not a very physical person. He\'s also incredibly beautiful, so there\'s that.

tag_professor: Participation matters (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Caring (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Pretty funny guy and also really laid back. Backpacking was extremely simple, the written/oral presentations were easy, the day hikes were brief, and the overnight camp out/hike was fun. Wished there was more day hikes like the actual hiking class, but the camp out made up for it.

comments: He is a nice guy, and has a laid back personality that made going to Tennis fun. But his final exam was much harder than expected, even though I studied for it thoroughly. Overall his class was fun, but it seems that getting an A in his class is difficult even if you attend each class.
